quest.name: Word from On High
journal: Alisaie is contemplating all that must yet be done in the wake of battle.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Bear it just a moment longer...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Take a deep breath for me. That's it...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The others are helping to treat the wounded. I'm planning to assist in moving them, but even so, we simply don't have enough hands.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm sure you're fit to fall over after what we've been through─gods know I am─but if you could see to a few of the patients, it would be an enormous help.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Captain Lyna is about somewhere, so you might also consider asking her if there are any other outstanding areas of need. We'll talk later.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Just hold on. You'll be in the next carriage back to the Crystarium, I promise...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With tear-filled eyes, the prone man gazes up at you. His fingers twitch, as if to reach for you, but he lacks the strength to raise his hand.

dialogue.name: INJUREDB03607
dialogue.text: If I turn, please... Please, kill me, I beg you.

dialogue.name: INJUREDC03607
dialogue.text: I killed her... I killed her! She was one of them, I know, but I... <sob>

dialogue.name: INJUREDC03607
dialogue.text: Maybe I deserve this... But she...
